body.p: After the success of the 2011 Screenshot Contest the Contest Team is doing it again!

The screenshots submitted are contributed by various Gentoo users and developers. Upon request of further details on a specific screenshot, one may try to locate the author in #gentoo channel on the Freenode IRC network or in our Gentoo Forums.
The Judges will consist of two active developer's and three independent Gentoo users.

ol.li: The images must be in 'png' format
One must prove the origin of their screenshot being from a Gentoo Linux machine. For this, an open terminal with emerge --info |head -n 1 output and include this in your screenshot.
Gentoo Users, Developers, and Staffers may all submit screenshots.
No more than three screenshots per contestant.
The top five screenshots selected by the judges will be posted on the Main Gentoo Linux Screenshots Page.
The submission deadline is 31st August, 2012 (2012-08-31) and the winner will be announced on 10th September, 2012 (2012-09-10).

body.impo: By submitting your screenshot you agree to the terms under the Creative Commons - Attribution / Share Alike license.
body.p: To enter the contest or to check out the current screenshots, head over to our 2012 Gentoo Screenshot Contest Home. You do not need to register in order to submit your screenshot.
If you want to contact us you can send an email to screenshots@gentoo.org, or talk about the cool screenshots on freenode irc, channel #gentoo-screenshots. Enjoy the contest!
